Name: LU 404 - Zoning, 47-15 34th Ave Rezoning, Queens (C 180530 ZMQ)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 180530 ZMQ, a Zoning Map amendment (L.U. No. 404).

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by Roll Call.

{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f1\fmodern\fprq1\fcharset0 Courier;}{\f2\fswiss\fprq2\fcharset0 Arial;}}
\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca, Jr. and Moya\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, Ashley Young\f1 ,\f0  LLC\f1 ,\f0  and John Young Associates\f1 ,\f0  LLC,\expndtw-6  filed an application \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 9b, changing from an R5 District to an R6B District, changing from a C8-1 District to an R6B District, changing from an R5 District to an R7X District, changing from a C8-1 District to an R7X District, establishing within existing and proposed R6B Districts, and establishing within a proposed R7X District a C2-4 District, in Queens, Community District 1 (ULURP No. C 180530 ZMQ) (the "Application");\par
\par
WHEREAS the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on April 12, 2019, its decision dated April 10, 2019 (the "Decision") on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1440\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7920 WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N 180529\expndtw-4  ZRQ\expndtw0  (L.U. No. 403), a zoning text amendment to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7560\tx7920\tx8640\tx8933\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on May 2, 2019;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the Revised Negative Declaration issued April 10\super th\nosupersub , 2019, which supersedes the Negative Declaration issued November 13\super th\nosupersub , 2018, and Revised Environmental Assessment Statement issued April 5\super th\nosupersub , 2019 (CEQR No. 19DCP003Q) which include an (E) designation to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to hazardous materials, air quality, and noise (the \ldblquote E\rdblquote  Designation (E-509));\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj  \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720 The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the (E) Designation (E-509) and Revised Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 180530 ZMQ, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission.\par
\pard\ltrpar\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560 The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 9b: \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720 1.\tab changing from an R5 District to an R6B District property bounded by a line 150 northeasterly of 34th Avenue, 47th Street, a line 140 feet northeasterly of 34th Avenue, and a line midway between 46th Street and 47th Street;\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 2.\tab changing from a C8-1 District to an R6B District property bounded by a line 140 feet northeasterly of 34th Avenue, 47th Street, 34th Avenue, a line 50 feet northwesterly of 47th Street, a line 100 feet northeasterly of 34th Avenue, and a line midway between 46th Street and 47th Street;\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 3.\tab changing from an R5 District to an R7D District property bounded by a line 150 feet northeasterly of 34th Avenue, 48th Street, a line 140 feet northeasterly of 34th Avenue, and 47th Street;\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 4.\tab changing from a C8-1 District to an R7D District property bounded by a line 140 feet northeasterly of 34th Avenue, 48th Street, 34th Avenue, and 47th Street; \f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 5.\tab establishing within existing and proposed R6B Districts a C2-4 district bounded by a line 150 feet northeasterly of 34th Avenue, 47th Street, 34th Avenue, and a line midway between 46th Street and 47th Street; and,\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 6.\tab establishing within a proposed R7D District a C2-4 District bounded by a line 150 feet northeasterly of 34th Avenue, 48th Street, 34th Avenue, and 47th Street; \f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\f0 as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated November 13, 2018, modified by the City Planning Commission on April 10, 2019, and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration E-509, Community District 1, Borough of Queens.\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\f0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj Adopted.\par
\par
\tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on May 29, 2019, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
\par
